name: A Spoonful Of Dollars
description:
Lone settlement in the wilderness, 18XX.

A pioneer family is fighting against hunger and is trying to survive in the rough environment. As their only source of income they are carving wooden spoons to be sold as an merchandise at a town half a day's ride away.

As you feel the cold breeze through your neck, you know that you are in a hurry to gather enough SUPPLIES to survive the long, dark winter.

Knowing very well that wolves are hunting for prey, you gather as many ROCKS you can fit in your wagon to use as a weapon in case they attack. 

Gameplay help and tips:

- Goal is to put 20 supplies (boxes) to storage.

- Every family member crafts 1 spoon and consumes 1 food a day. Without food they will starve and die.

- Wolves might attack you when traveling. Everything you have can be used as a weapon against them. Try them all!

- Town prices change daily.

Made for Bored Pixels Jam 8 in 4 days.
